mapper.insert: insert into mission (title, context, miImg, catId, userIdx, createdAt) values (#{title},#{context},#{miImg}, #{catId},#{userIdx}, curdate())
mapper.select: SELECT m.idx as idx, m.title as title, m.createdAt as createdAt, m.miImg as miImg, u.profileImg as uprofileImg, u.nickname as unickname FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC limit #{row},8

SELECT m.idx as idx, m.title as title, m.createdAt as createdAt, m.miImg as miImg, u.profileImg as uprofileImg, u.nickname as unickname FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx where m.catId = #{catId} ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC limit #{row},8
select count(idx) from mission where catId=#{catId}
select title, miImg, createdAt, likecount from mission where userIdx=#{userIdx} order by createdAt desc
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN m.success = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) * 100), 0) AS successRate FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx WHERE u.idx = #{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE mission SET likecount = likecount + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE mission SET likecount = likecount - 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT likecount FROM mission WHERE idx=#{idx}
